control.name: KoolComboBox - Advanced PHP ComboBox
control.metadescription: KoolComboBox is excellent PHP Dropdown box. It is easy-to-use, highly customized interface and has many advanced behavior options. VIEW DEMO NOW!
control.metakeywords: php combobox,php ajax combobox, php combo box,php dropdown list
control.description: KoolComboBox extends the capability of combobox to the max.Easy-to-use, highly customized interface, advanced behavior options are the strongest points that make KoolComboBox better than any other industrial similar controls.
